Hello everyone!  

I wanted to present the basic structure of the new SHQ s=
ite.  SHQ 
will be hosted by http://alohaworld.com/ and watched over by an =

administrator.

The site will be very simple and will not have dozens upon=
 dozens of 
pages with info.  The bulk of the history will be in book form =
you 
can download as a pdf file.  If we have an update to the book then 
th=
ere will be an update notice.

I would really, really, really appreciate yo=
ur opinion and 
suggestions.  Please send me your ideas secretarytocapt3(at=
)
hotmail.com by Friday August 8th.

This is really a labor of love, but it=
's for everyone here so please 
contribute and tell us what's on your mind =
(^_^).

The site will be split like this:

I. Index Page 

1) news, updates=
, links, and sponsor
info

------------------------------------
II. History=


1) page which contains pdf file for the e-book (this e-book will 
contain=
 alot of info including material covering Aizu)

2) time line
a) General ti=
meline before Bakumatsu Era
b) 1861-1870
b) 1871-1880
c) 1881-1890
d) 1891-=
1912
e) Post Meiji
------------------------------------
III. Fiction

1) Ga=
llery (cosplay pics, fanart, etc)
2) Fiction (or links to complete fanficti=
on)
3) Shinsengumi Filmography (by Michael from ninjadojo.com)

-----------=
-------------------------
IV. Makoto

1) Makoto Multimedia Dojo (fan audio,=
 music vids etc)

Thanks for reading.
